official_title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the 28th day of September 1976 as "Teacher's Day."

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President of the United States to designate September 28, 1976, as "Teacher's Day."

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the 28th day of September 1976 as "Teacher's Day."
